description: Where a future price exists for a product from a specified date then products scheduled for delivery on or after that date will have the price effective on that date

description: Extended information on each product with the ability to define product types - each with an infinitely extensible set of product attributes. name: Recommendations

You control who sees which recommendations (targeting orthogonal or overlapping user segments), how recommendations should look and where to show them - with instant search results; on product details pages, basket and checkout pages.
